casebody.data:
STATE
v.
RICHARDSON 2018-1705 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 20, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Appellant's motion to seal memorandum in support of jurisdiction and appellee's motion to seal memorandum in response to jurisdiction granted. DeWine, J., would deny both motions to seal.

French, J., dissents and would accept the cause on proposition of law Nos. I and II.

Stewart and Donnelly, JJ., dissent and would accept the cause.
